snippet.title: The Derailed - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page: store.steampowered.com/app/3240310/The_Derailed/

The Derailed - a first-person psychological horror game in the "walking simulator" genre.

Raindrops crash against the leaky roof, with a damp scent lingering in the air. Decades-worn walls, rattling window panes in the wind, and the hollow echo of footsteps — all around, the setting seems to repeatedly warn you that you don’t belong here. But there is no other choice; the only path is forward.

#horror #horrorgame #unrealengine5
